p: Protozoa were affected by the addition of the 3 compounds compared to CTR, with an increase of about 50% ( P < 0.001). No modification for the protozoa groups was detected. The relative abundance of bacterial phyla and genera was affected by the addition of EUCA, which increased ( P = 0.011) the presence of Ruminococcus ( Table 5). Moreover, the addition of EUCA tended to increase Firmicutes and decrease Bacteriodetes ( P = 0.090 and P = 0.084, respectively). The relative abundance of Anaereovibrio was lower ( P < 0.05) for CAM and BOR compared to EUCA.
